storyInfo: At both the pinnacle and base of the command tower, Rhodes Island and the Self-Salvation Corps engage the Sarkaz in a fierce battle, not expecting the Nachzehrer's quick return.

attributes.content: These filthy rebels! They've been at this since Sudean!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Bring out that massive metal thing of yours!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You mean the self-propelled cannon? Sarkaz, there's still lots of our men up ahead!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Send them a signal.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Ever heard of danger close? You know how wide its attack range is? They won't get away in time!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: That's their problem. Our warriors know how to survive on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Over there—A movable mechanical Originium cannon!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What... What the hell is this? That's no normal artillery shell!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Did Kazdel have some kind of advanced research institute I never heard of?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: And in such a short time too... How did Manfred manage this?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: Have you found the control area with your drones yet?;Focus.

attributes.content: Control area... Control area... Crap, Doctor. These artillery shells've got Arts that jam my drones.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Like I said, Londinium's system is easy to crack, but Sarkaz witchcraft is tough!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Doctor, we'll take it from here.
Whoa, Feist!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Everything's set the way you wanted it.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The engineering team will make sure your drones will fly free.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You've got an idea?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Miss Closure, these Originium cannons were assembled in our factory.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: So... You aren't planning on taking them apart right here and now, are you?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Haha, if we were Vampires, we definitely could've given it a shot.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Too bad, most of us are just normal craftsmen.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But we know what we've made with our own hands.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We know how to target their weak points to create an opening for our friends who can actually put up a fight.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: After all, this is how us engineers can put ourselves to use on the battlefield. Isn't that right?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The zipline... You're gonna climb onto that?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Your drones will function as normal if we get the cannon under control, right?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: In theory. That's too risky, though...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We're working together here.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I need you and the Doctor to help us lock onto the safest landing point.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: As the cannons echo in the air, Feist focuses on the battlefield before him.

He sees not the fierce Sarkaz, but the machinery by the conveyor belts he's the most familiar with. The thunderous sound of the enormous machine's movement is no different from the rhythms he knows so well.
He will take back the city that belongs to them, his own way.
Phew... I've always wanted to see a battle from up above. Isn't this the perfect chance?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The giant machine ambles down the street.
Compared to its colossal form, the men on the battlefield, be they Victorian or Sarkaz, are almost insignificant.
Its footsteps cannot be halted. Its gaze can easily melt the blocks.
It is practically the ruler of this steel jungle.
Yet it suddenly lets out a wail.
From a blind spot in its vision, a dozen grappling hooks latch onto the weakest point of its neck.
Immediately thereafter, several dozen figures climb onto its back via the zipline.
Doctor, we've got it under control!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: Casters, strike!
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: On it!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Look at you, Banshee. You won't allow even a single drop of blood near you.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Every drop you control contains your witchcraft.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Oh ho ho. The curse of the Banshee.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Since when have the Banshees been as boring and uninteresting as you?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I still remember how they flew through the dark night, blowing their bone-whistles—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: They mourned those lost to the wastelands with their sharp, sorrowful cries. At the same time, they mercilessly dug their pitch-black fingers into the skulls of those pitiful souls.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Banshee, that is what a Banshee is supposed to be.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: They have always been the hunters that the Vampires admired the most. On the battlefield, we fought alongside one another with fear as our weapon, taking the lives of our feeble enemies.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But the Banshees of today have lost their way. Your kind has locked your true selves behind that attire not unlike what the Leithanian Casters wear. Decrepit and pretentious.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I'm afraid you are the one who's lost your way, Vampire.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Time does more than relentlessly erode the lands. It shapes life as well.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Why not take a look at yourself? Your form has long since changed, you are no longer as you were.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Hmph... What significance is the form my flesh takes?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Your flesh, like my robe, is the true form in which we walk the world.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: The roots of Royal Court may have rotted away long ago, but Royal Court, as it stands today with its canopy raised up high, remains unwilling to fall to the ground.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: How pathetic... That which is dead continues to draw nutrients from the barren soil, denying itself the chance to receive new life.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: So this is your true goal?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The smile disappears from the Vampire's face. Next to him, the boiling blood settles into stasis for a brief moment.
A faint tremor can be felt beneath the ground, before the floor above it starts to shake as well.
Blood. Blood marches forward.
Operators, hold!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The battlefield below us...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: He suddenly realizes he has stayed here for too long. Lettou is far from the only weak point in the command tower.

While both he and the Vampire had their attention drawn to the 'King of Sarkaz' and their old acquaintances, Rhodes Island and the Self-Salvation Corps have very likely been drawing ever closer to the information they need.
This was Rhodes Island's plan all along. They stood no chance of quickly defeating him and the Vampire. They simply wanted to buy themselves time.
I must...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You're too late.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Yes, he is. He can sacrifice an arm to escape from Ascalon, but the thing that's truly stopping him is the sea of blood before his eyes.
The Sanguinarch has already been angered. They are all trapped on this battlefield.
...Banshee.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You dare to plot the destruction of the Royal Court... the very manifestation of Sarkaz heritage?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: An earth-shattering surge of blood envelops the entire command tower. The Rhodes Island Operators and the Defense Force soldiers are all moments away from being submerged.
That is, until a shapeless force divides this red sea of blood.
I do this not for destruction, but for my salvation.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Don't let your long memories bind you. Release yourself from your pride, from the olden days, Old Sarkaz King.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: The Sarkaz have changed. The Sarkaz must change.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Under his bone pen, golden incantations write themselves loop by loop.
Heeding its master's rage, the pool of blood rises from the floor, the walls, and his head and charges toward the unapproachable young Banshee, as well as those he is shielding.
All because the Lord of Curses has already set the rules upon this high tower in a foreign land.
Doctor, the control tower...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: The situation's intense.;I believe in Amiya, Logos, and Ascalon.

attributes.content: Phew... Looks like they managed to stall that scary guy...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Doctor, the drones have reached the control area.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Gonna start hacking now...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: Give me an ETA.;How long will that take?

attributes.content: Half an hour... No, twenty minutes.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Doctor, I know Amiya and the Corps guys are having a tough time right now... Trust me, I wish I had a couple more pairs of hands too!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The gigantic machine lets out another growl.
The previously silent cannon begins to rev up again.
What just happened?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: The men on the cannon are under attack!
attributes.name: Rockrock
Self-Salvation Corps Fighter
attributes.content: There are hostiles in the distance...

attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter
attributes.content: Gah!
It's the Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: No idea what kind of Arts those Sarkaz are using!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: All of a sudden... I just couldn't breathe... I...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Confessarius witchcraft... These Sarkaz are their guards.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: When one has one's life depleted by this witchcraft so quickly, not even medical Arts can save them.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Have Feist evacuate the cannon surroundings with our fighters.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: But then the weapon will go out of control again.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Our men's lives are precious.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I... will destroy the berserk weapon.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*... Commander, I'm feeling much better...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Commander, are these... your Arts?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: This light... is mobile.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Compared to mine... yes, it's much warmer.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: L-Look! Someone just appeared behind those Confessarius guards! Who's that?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: White horns, black robe... Is that... a Confessarius?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: The Confessarius... She's fighting the other Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Doctor! That's—That's Shining!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Did you ask her to come here?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: Kal'tsit has kept in touch with her.;She's doing this of her own accord.

attributes.content: I knew how badass Shining could get, but this is my first time seeing her fight for real.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: How do I put it? I... I...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'm starting to understand why she avoids fighting so much.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Madam Confessarius...
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: You came to the fight after all. Once again, you went against our leader's will.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: If my actions are under his control, wouldn't that make my departure hardly meaningful?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Do you really despise our leader so much?
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I've never despised him. I've only ever despised myself.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The guard's mask splits, allowing his final expression before he succumbs to be reflected in the sheath of the Confessarius's sword.
Shining gazes at her opponent. Her eyes are both calm and sorrowful.
Once again, the final flicker of a living flame has been burned onto her blade forever.
The mist of blood is rapidly evaporating under the power of the witchcraft.
Countless beams of black energy are shot through the fissures torn open by the witchery.
The tides of blood that shroud the command tower have receded a little.
Hah.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Your swordsmanship... Not bad.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Your Highness, we must finish this quickly.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Don't disturb me.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The blood's roar forces Manfred to take a few steps back.
Ascalon's armblade follows him closely. He knows she won't let him get away easily.
A red bolt of lightning flashes across the clouds above the command tower.
This... The Teekazwurtzen.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Of course you'd know. Just as I know your armblade.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: A signal... You're contacting him.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Amiya, we don't have much time.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Right, as long as we bring Lettou with us...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Nngh—!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Watch your defenses. The Vampire's power is far greater than this.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Hm... What a waste of blood.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: The battle before was far from enough to satisfy the Vampire.
He turns his attention to the Victorian soldiers hiding nearby.
What...! You... You can't...
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: It'll be fine, Lettou. Soon enough, I shan't even need to keep you alive.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Lt. Colonel... Lt. Colonel!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Ngah—!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: The soldiers can no longer speak.
They fumble their way to the Vampire, as blood sprays out of their spines, one stream after another, heeding his orders in their arms and legs, marching forward rapidly.
They have received the Sanguinarch's blessing.
Do it. To your heart's content.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Blood doesn't dry simply because of death. It will only flow faster, thanks to your futile actions.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: His soldiers no longer follow his commands.
He watches them advance and advance... until they reach the edge of the rooftop.
The Sarkaz's fight will soon destroy this place. Their eyes do not even see these normal soldiers who are in flux between life and death.
Most of the soldiers are Victorian. They are of entirely different upbringings than him. They remain oblivious to his objective and the deal he made with the Sarkaz to this very moment.
They simply followed him here... to the edge.
*sigh*...
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: He knows he shouldn't have moved. The Vampire and Manfred would have been in no hurry to kill him as long as he hid in the far back.
But he still wanted to catch those soldiers about to fall to the depths below.
Ugh...
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Black... energy beams... hah...
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Lt. Colonel Lettou.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can feel pain... in your eyes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You think of yourself a Gaulish man. You revere a massive phantom of the past. You want to take hold of it and bring it back.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do you really believe the Sarkaz's word? Do you really believe... that your dream to rebuild Gaul is possible?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You are afraid, sir.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You pretend you still have control... because you don't want to face the coward in you who wants to flee the war.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You force yourself to believe that all the sacrifices you're making are for Gaul.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... you can't forget the eyes of those men you've deceived, who you called to their deaths.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You... You are the young Lord of Fiends... they spoke of.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: ...I am.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And I am your enemy.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... you held me back. You don't want to see me die here.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou
Lt. Colonel Lettou
attributes.content: They call you the Lord of Fiends... the King of Sarkaz... but all I see...

attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou
attributes.content: ...is a kind, gentle girl.
Nngh—!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: An intense pain suddenly seizes her.
This isn't the doing of the Liberi before her, nor is it the Originium Arts of the Vampire or Manfred.
After all, this isn't an attack.
Amiya, oh Amiya.
A voice calls out to her. A voice as soft as a snow-white feather quilt that has been set out to dry in the sun.
Amiya lifts her head.
The sky above her comes smashing down. The thick dark clouds surge towards her, engulfing her from top to bottom.
...Like a tight, suffocating embrace.
Doctor, Commander, we've taken back control of the cannon!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Ten minutes... Gimme just ten more minutes, and I'll take care of them all.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Phew... Doctor, for the first time these past few days, I think we just might be able to win this.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Miss Closure...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: What's up?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I really wish you hadn't said that.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You're thinking I must've jinxed... it... Holy shit, Doctor, what the hell's... My surveillance drones' alarms all started blaring at once!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Come on, say something. Going all quiet like that is really freaking me out!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Wait, that's—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: (Growls in warning)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: She isn't buying us time... Uh...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Doctor, you aren't trying to tell me... the Nachzehrer came back early, are you?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Their advance must have been silent. Otherwise, someone was sure to have noticed that they had broken through the walls and crossed half the city.
These footsteps are nothing but a signal that penetrates the hearts of all those on the battlefield through the trembling ground.
Every street their eyes can reach is filled with Sarkaz warriors.
The shadows cast by the dark clouds above cannot engulf them. After all, they are the dark shadows themselves. They are the ones who engulf the land.
